name: UpdateOrganizationMemberDetails
description:
Update details of an organization member in Datadog.

Use this tool to partially update the information of a member within an organization on Datadog. This should be called when changes to a member's profile or permissions are needed.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization in Datadog. This is required to specify which organization's member is being updated.

parameters.name: member_user_uuid
parameters.description: The unique user UUID of the organization member to update.

parameters.name: member_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing member details to update, like 'id', 'user', 'level', 'joined_at', 'updated_at', 'is_2fa_enabled', 'has_social_auth', and 'last_login'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
